search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for GoTo Connect (go-to-connect.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for GoTo Connect can be found at: [https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: GoTo Connect Plans & Pricing | All-in-One Voice & Video Software - GoTo

extracted_content.content:
Connect Phone System
--------------------

An award-winning smart business phone system that combines advanced cloud-based telephony with built-in meeting and messaging capabilities.

[Compare Plans](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#feature)

**Includes:**

*   Free calls to 50 countries and included toll-free minutes[\*](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#disclaimer)
*   Unlimited auto attendants, dial plans, call routing and queues
*   Video meetings up to 250 participants
*   Teams chat, SMS and MMS
*   AI GoPilot, SSO, multi-site admin and device management
*   Mobile and desktop app
*   24/7 support with 99.999% reliability
*   MS Teams integration

*   Attendant Console
    
    Streamlined call management
    
*   Integrations
    
    Advanced integration bundle
    
*   Reporting and Analytics
    
    Advanced analytics and reporting
    
*   AI Receptionist
    
    Automate customer conversations with AI
    

An all-in-one customer experience platform that integrates comprehensive CX tools and digital channels with our award-winning smart business phone system.

[Compare Plans](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#feature)

**Everything in Phone System plus:**

*   Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, SMS campaigns, web chat and surveys[\*\*](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#disclaimer)
*   Shared inbox centralizing multi channel communications
*   Enhanced reporting and analytics (Interaction details, AI call summaries, customizable dashboards)
*   Attendant console to streamline call management
*   Advanced integrations with ServiceNow, Zendesk and more

*   AI Receptionist
    
    Automate customer conversations with AI
    

Connect Contact Center
----------------------

An all-in-one, AI-powered contact center solution that manages every customer interaction across a wide range of channels, with powerful reporting and key integrations.

[Compare Plans](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#feature)

**Everything in CX plus:**

*   AI chat analysis, supervisor analytics, real time and historical reports
*   Agent dashboard and softphone
*   Skills assignment, tag and priority management
*   Call wrap up, auto queue callback and auto dialer
*   Monitor and coach agents, co-browsing, call dispositions
*   Intelligent call routing, ring strategy and custom ringback music

*   AI Optimization
    
    AI-generated summaries and insights
    
*   Attendant Console
    
    Streamlined call management
    
*   AI Quality Management
    
    AI quality management software
    
*   AI Receptionist
    
    Automate customer conversations with AI
    

Phone System Connect CX Contact Center

Call from Any Device, Anywhere.

Communicate anywhere, on any device, via desktop, web, iOS and Android apps.

 ![Image 1](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 2](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 3](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Existing Number Porting

Keep your existing mobile or landline number(s) with easy porting (transferring) to GoTo Connect's cloud phone service.

 ![Image 4](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 5](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 6](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Local, Toll-Free & Vanity Numbers

Choose a number that best suits your business and resonates with your customers.

 ![Image 7](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 8](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 9](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Toll-Free Minutes

Add a toll-free number to your plan for your customers' convenience.

1,000 free minutes shared across account\* 1,000 free minutes shared across account\* 1,000 free minutes shared across account\*

International Calling

Make and receive calls between 50+ countries - included free with specific plans.

50+ countries included free\* 50+ countries included free\* 50+ countries included free\*

Smart Call Routing

Never miss another call. Route calls to multiple phones in a specified sequence so you or someone on your team is always within reach, wherever you are. [Click to expand](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#)

 ![Image 10](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 11](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 12](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Auto Attendants Recorded Greetings

Custom greetings seamlessly route callers to the right place.

Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited

Customizable Dial Plans

Map out call flows using an intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Set different patterns for after hours, weekends or holidays. [Click to expand](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#)

Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited

Ring Groups

Ensure calls are answered quickly by configuring multiple devices to ring simultaneously until an agent can answer.

Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited

Call Queues

Distribute incoming calls to participating agents for effective customer service and minimal wait times.

 ![Image 13](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 14](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 15](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Hot Desking

Allow users to share office phones and workstations by logging in to any device using their GoTo Connect account.

 ![Image 16](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 17](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 18](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Emergency Calling (E911)

Access emergency calling services and dial 911 directly from your IP deskphone or softphone.

 ![Image 19](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 20](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 21](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Virtual Fax Manager

Save time and hassle by sending and receiving faxes right from your email inbox. [Click to expand](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#)

 ![Image 22](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 23](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 24](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Voicemail to Email

Get voicemail recordings sent to your email inbox with a text transcription, so you can listen or read at your convenience.

 ![Image 25](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 26](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 27](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Call Handling

View Caller ID, then park, transfer, or forward calls to the right person – without disconnecting the caller in the process.

 ![Image 28](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 29](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 30](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Paging

Quickly reach one or several colleagues by communicating over two-way speakerphone.

 ![Image 31](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 32](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 33](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Intercom

Reach colleagues anywhere with intercom messages. Receiving phones answer on speakerphone unless on "Do Not Disturb."

 ![Image 34](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 35](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 36](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Call Recording

Record all company calls or just those from specific numbers within your account. Access cloud-stored recordings from anywhere.

 ![Image 37](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 38](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 39](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Multi-Site Compatible

Manage all your sites and customize users and devices by site. Configure emergency 911 for different locations.

Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited

Attendant Console ![Image 40](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Team Messaging with File Sharing

Keep your business connected with easy-to-use team chat. You can also share images, documents and files with your team members and messaging groups. [Click to expand](https://www.goto.com/connect/pricing#)

 ![Image 41](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 42](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 43](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

SMS & MMS

Send & receive SMS & MMS. Your plan comes with a certain number of credits per seat, per month. An overage rate will be applied once that allowance is reached. Only available in the United States and Canada.

 ![Image 44](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 45](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 46](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Automated SMS Messages

Enable automatic text responses and personalize the message for your customers.

 ![Image 47](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 48](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 49](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Video Meetings

Hold video meetings with screen sharing, in-session chat, anywhere on any device.

Up to 250 meeting participants Up to 250 meeting participants Up to 250 meeting participants

Local and Cloud Meeting Recording

Access meeting recordings for playback later. Record your meeting directly from your account or store your recording to a cloud storage service for a minimal fee.

 ![Image 50](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 51](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 52](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

AI Meeting Summary

AI-powered meeting overviews and actionable next steps for post-session.

 ![Image 53](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 54](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 55](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Closed Captioning

Automatically transcribe spoken words in as text in real time.

 ![Image 56](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 57](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 58](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

End-to-End Video Encryption

Keep your meeting private from those who don't have the decryption key or password. End-to-End Encryption (E2EE) provides an additional form of encryption for an extra layer of security.

 ![Image 59](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 60](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 61](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Flexible Layout

Customize your personal meeting experience view by splitting or "popping out" the GoTo desktop app into multiple window, organized in any way that best suits your needs.

 ![Image 62](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 63](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 64](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Smart Notes

Take notes directly inside a meeting session. Notes are automatically saved and can be shared instantly after the meeting.

 ![Image 65](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 66](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 67](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Meeting Co-Organizers

Designate a co-organizer to start and run meetings on your behalf (only members of your account can be co-organizers).

 ![Image 68](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 69](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 70](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

InRoom Link (H.323.SIP)

Join and host meetings directly from your existing conference room system.

 ![Image 71](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 72](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 73](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Meeting Transcriptions

Access and view meeting transcriptions post session. You can search, copy, and download the transcript locally to your computer

 ![Image 74](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 75](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 76](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Miro Integration

Collaborate and whiteboard with Miro directly in your GoTo Connect meeting sessions.

 ![Image 77](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 78](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 79](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Breakout Rooms

Organizers and co-organizers can split meeting attendees into smaller groups for separate discussions. A great way to keep attendees engaged, manage conversations, and work in smaller groups.

 ![Image 80](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 81](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 82](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Emoji and Audio Reactions

Use reactions to quickly and easily participate in the session to engage without speaking. If enabled by the organizer, you can send reactions with sound effects.

 ![Image 83](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 84](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 85](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Shared Inbox

Using our shared inbox allows your team members to see and respond to any message responses with your shared contacts.

 ![Image 86](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 87](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Custom Surveys

Create a custom survey to assess your customer's experience. Send as part of a text campaign or set up automatic follow-up surveys.

 ![Image 88](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 89](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

AI-Powered Messaging Assistant

Customize your messages with AI based on what your message is about, the tone and campaign type.

 ![Image 90](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 91](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

WebChat Channel

Set up a webchat widget to communicate to your customers through your website.

 ![Image 92](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 93](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Facebook & Instagram Messenger Channel

Connect your messaging to Facebook or Instagram Messenger to reach more customers in one centralized place.

 ![Image 94](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 95](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

WhatsApp Channel

Manage all WhatsApp customer interactions in one unified inbox.

 ![Image 96](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 97](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

SMS & MMS Campaigns

Create SMS and MMS campaigns to send custom messages to customers in bulk.

 ![Image 98](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 99](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

 ![Image 156](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 157](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 158](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

AI Text-To-Speech Sound Clips

 ![Image 168](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 169](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A) ![Image 170](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

 ![Image 174](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)![Image 175](https://www.goto.com/-/media/images/shared/icons-old/ui/checkmark-green.svg?la=en&hash=C42D9DDDDC14E64D01EFC6D40BAE066A)

Incentivized Review

Jan 7, 2024

GoTo Connect is an excellent choice for us because it's a reasonably priced solution that has all the necessary advanced...

![Image 181: Reviewer icon](https://media.trustradius.com/profile-photos/659a8a647de5a852aa6d1cf4/BBLJLRC17ZPN.jpeg)

Incentivized Review

Nov 25, 2022

We have saved hundreds each month from local communication companies

![Image 182: Reviewer icon](https://media.trustradius.com/profile-photos/62aa0d1d147bb00031281c0a/S2SHWSDJ7I2T.jpeg)

brad kercherOperations ManagerOhio Green WorksRetail | 11-50 employees

Depends on your business and your needs! Contact our sales team to learn more.

Hardware is optional! GoTo Connect’s video conferencing, voice calls, messages and admin features all work right on your computer or mobile device – whether in your browser or the GoTo app. If you need to build a phone system for your office, talk to our sales team.

Yes! We offer a multitude of integrations to streamline workflows and maximize productivity. Check out our [integrations marketplace](https://www.goto.com/integrations) for more information. Can't find what you’re looking for? Build your own with the help of our [developer center](https://developer.goto.com/).

Yes! Contact us at 1-866-890-8931 to learn how GoTo Connect is designed to drive productivity and growth for businesses. Learn about our business pricing options.

Getting started with GoTo Connect is easy! With our intuitive interface and visual dial plan editor, you can quickly create and customize your phone system, no IT experience needed.

Exact time to deployment is different for everyone, and depends on how many seats you have, how many numbers you’re porting (transferring), unique business needs, among other factors.

If you need assistance setting up, we’re always [here to help](https://support.goto.com/connect).

Free international calling up to 52 countries is included only in Standard tier. For more details on country availability and calling rates visit our [international calling page](https://www.goto.com/connect/international-calling).

We are required to charge any applicable taxes based on your location.

SMS credits are an allowance provided to your GoTo Connect account to send and receive SMS and MMS messages.

SMS (Short Message Service) is the standard format for sending text messages. Each SMS message deducts at least 1 credit from your allowance. A single credit accounts for up to 160 simple characters (excluding emojis, links, or pictures). SMS credits reset every month. SMS service is only available in the US and Canada. After allotted SMS credits are used, the overage charge in the US is $0.0055 per credit and in Canada is $0.00715.

MMS (Multimedia Messaging Service): This format allows you to send messages with multimedia content, such as pictures, audio, and video. Sending an MMS message will deduct 3 SMS credits from your allowance, reflecting the additional resources and bandwidth required for multimedia. MMS service is only available in the US and Canada.

Try a powerful, yet affordable voice & video conferencing solution integrated into an industry leading business VoIP phone system. Learn more and contact us today!

Phone System Connect CX Contact Center

Hardware is optional! GoTo Connect’s video conferencing, voice calls, messages and admin features all work right on your computer or mobile device – whether in your browser or the GoTo app. If you need to build a phone system for your office, talk to our sales team.

Yes! We offer a multitude of integrations to streamline workflows and maximize productivity. Check out our [integrations marketplace](https://www.goto.com/integrations) for more information. Getting started with GoTo Connect is easy! With our intuitive interface and visual dial plan editor, you can quickly create and customize your phone system, no IT experience needed.

Exact time to deployment is different for everyone, and depends on how many seats you have, how many numbers you’re porting (transferring), unique business needs, among other factors.

If you need assistance setting up, we’re always [here to help](https://support.goto.com/connect).

Free international calling up to 52 countries is included only in Standard tier. For more details on country availability and calling rates visit our [international calling page](https://www.goto.com/connect/international-calling).

We are required to charge any applicable taxes based on your location.

SMS credits are an allowance provided to your GoTo Connect account to send and receive SMS and MMS messages.

SMS (Short Message Service) is the standard format for sending text messages. Each SMS message deducts at least 1 credit from your allowance. A single credit accounts for up to 160 simple characters (excluding emojis, links, or pictures). SMS credits reset every month. SMS service is only available in the US and Canada. After allotted SMS credits are used, the overage charge in the US is $0.0055 per credit and in Canada is $0.00715.

MMS (Multimedia Messaging Service): This format allows you to send messages with multimedia content, such as pictures, audio, and video. Sending an MMS message will deduct 3 SMS credits from your allowance, reflecting the additional resources and bandwidth required for multimedia. MMS service is only available in the US and Canada.

Try a powerful, yet affordable voice & video conferencing solution integrated into an industry leading business VoIP phone system. Learn more and contact us today!
